entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:02 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0Â°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:54 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:54 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
